attributes.action: unite Yorkshire as a county and to get rid of South Yorkshire, West Yorkshire, North Yorkshire, East Yorkshire and the Humberside to form as one big county, just like it used to be.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the 1970's, the British Government divided Yorkshire into 4 sectors. South Yorkshire, East Yorkshire, West Yorkshire and North Yorkshire. It is time that Yorkshire is reunited as a whole county. If you look at neighbouring counties such as Derbyshire, Nottinghamshire and Lincolnshire, you will see that they are not separtated. Why should Yorkshire be different?
